author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

One of the most contentious releases this year, there's no doubting the quality of Metal Gear Solid Delta's remastering efforts - but what about performance? Alex takes a look at the PC version, finding an inherently compromised effort, and yet still the best place to play the game.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

Mods listing:
MGS DeltaFix from Lyall
https://codeberg.org/Lyall/MGSDeltaFix
Adding HW Lumen, DLSS RR and FG
https://www.reddit.com/r/metalgearsolid/comments/1n15pkx/hardware_rt_ray_reconstruction_and_dlss_framegen/

00:00:00 Introduction
00:01:00 The things it does right
00:02:33 Why are we still here? Just to suffer?
00:06:55 What GPU do you need and how can it run better?
00:11:27 How mods ease the pain
00:13:54 Conclusion
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta PC - The Best Way To Play - DF Tech Review + Optimised Settings
